nodes.name: payProvider

addClaim(bytes32,uint256).details: add a claim to a ServiceClaim contract i.e. the provider wants to file a claim for a service rendered

params._amount: the amount to be claimed by the provider
params._serviceClaimID: the ID of the ServiceClaim contract

addClaim(bytes32,uint256).return: ClaimID the ID of the claim

addInsurer(string).details: add an insurnace provider to the network

params._name: the name of the insurance provider

addPatient(string,bytes32).details: add a patient to the network

params._name: is the name of the patient
params._providerID: is the current provider of the patient

addPatient(string,bytes32).return: pID is a bytes32 represented id number for the patient

addProvider(string,bytes32).details: add a provider to the network
addProvider(string,bytes32).return: the pID of the health provider -

newServiceClaim(string,bytes32,bytes32).details: create an instance of a ServiceClaim contract
newServiceClaim(string,bytes32,bytes32).return: serviceContractHash is the id of the ServiceClaim contract

verifyClaim(bytes32).details: invoke the verifyClaim function in the ServiceClaim contract

params._serviceClaimID: the id of the ServiceClaim contract
